_header: In thee is all my bliss
_description: Inscriptions on a chest made by a usurer and a priest — three (four?) lines in an exemplum

StPauls9Dxix.Transcription:
In þe ys all my blysseIn þe ys all my þouhtFayr
                    and fals suche ys þys worldÞer to to tryste hit ys
                    nouht
StPauls9Dxix.Note: Written as prose, seven lines from foot of page.
